name: HSP_CLP_CLAIM_HX_CMT
description: This table contains comments associated with actions performed on claim print records.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HX_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated with a claim history action.
